00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Balanced traveling salesman problem double threshold algorithm.
00003  *
00004  * Heuristic for solving the balanced traveling salesman problem double
00005  * threshold algorithm (BalTSP DT-Algorithm).
00006  *
00007  * @author  John LaRusic
00008  * @ingroup lib
00009  ****************************************************************************/
00010 #include "common.h"
00011 #include "lb.h"
00012 #include "btsp.h"
00013 #include "baltsp.h"

00016 /****************************************************************************
00017  * Private function prototypes
00018  ****************************************************************************/
00019 /**
00020  *  @brief  Determines if a tour is feasible given min/max costs based upon
00021  *          lower bounds for the BTSP.
00022  *  @param  problem [in] problem structure
00023  *  @param  min_cost [in] min_cost to consider for active edges
00024  *  @param  max_cost [in] max_cost to consider for active edges
00025  *  @param  is_feasible [out] ARROW_TRUE if tour feasibly could exist
00026  */
00027 int 
00028 dt2_lb_feasible(arrow_problem *problem, int min_cost, int max_cost, 
00029                 int *is_feasible);

00031 
00032 /****************************************************************************
00033  * Public function implementations
00034  ****************************************************************************/
00035 int 
00036 arrow_balanced_tsp_dt2(arrow_problem *problem, 
00037                        arrow_problem_info *info,
00038                        arrow_baltsp_params *params,
00039                        double *lb_time,
00040                        arrow_btsp_result *tour_result)
00041 {
00042     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00043     int is_feasible = ARROW_FALSE;
00044     int i, low, high;
00045     int p, q;
00046     int best_tour_low, best_tour_high;
00047     int low_val, high_val, max;
00048     int best_gap, cur_gap;
00049     double start_time, end_time;
00050     arrow_problem asym_problem;
00051     arrow_problem *solve_problem;
00052     arrow_btsp_result cur_tour_result;
00053     
00054     /* Print out debug information */
00055     arrow_debug("With Improvements? %s\n", (params->with_improvements ? "Yes" : "No"));
00056     arrow_debug("BalTSP Lower Bound: %d\n", params->lower_bound);
00057     arrow_debug("BTSP Min Cost: %d\n", params->btsp_min_cost);
00058     arrow_debug("BTSP Max Cost: %d\n", params->btsp_max_cost);
00059     arrow_debug("MSTSP Min Cost: %d\n", params->mstsp_min_cost);
00060     arrow_debug("Total solve steps: %d\n", params->num_steps);
00061     arrow_debug("\n");
00062     
00063 
00064     /* Determine if we need to convert a symmetric instance into an asymmetric instance */
00065     solve_problem = problem;
00066     if(!problem->symmetric)
00067     {
00068         if(!arrow_problem_abtsp_to_sbtsp(params->deep_copy, problem, params->infinity, &asym_problem))
00069         {
00070             arrow_print_error("Could not create symmetric transformation.");
00071             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00072         }
00073         solve_problem = &asym_problem;
00074     }
00075     
00076     /* Setup result structures */
00077     *lb_time = 0.0;
00078     arrow_btsp_result_init(solve_problem, &cur_tour_result);
00079     tour_result->optimal = ARROW_FALSE;
00080     tour_result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00081     tour_result->total_time = 0.0;
00082     tour_result->bin_search_steps = 0;
00083     for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00084     {
00085         tour_result->solver_attempts[i] = 0;
00086         tour_result->solver_time[i] = 0.0;
00087     }    
00088     
00089     /* Find low/high/max values */
00090     low = 0; best_tour_low = 0;
00091     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->btsp_min_cost, &low))
00092     {
00093         arrow_debug("Could not find btsp_min_cost in cost_list\n");
00094         arrow_debug(" - Using low = 0\n");
00095         low = 0;
00096     }
00097     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->btsp_max_cost, &high))
00098     {
00099         arrow_debug("Could not find btsp_max_cost in cost_list\n");
00100         arrow_debug(" - Using high = 0\n");
00101         high = 0;
00102     }
00103     best_tour_low = params->btsp_min_cost;
00104     best_tour_high = params->btsp_max_cost;
00105     
00106     if(best_tour_high - best_tour_low == params->lower_bound)
00107     {
00108         arrow_debug("The BTSP solution is an optimal BalTSP solution!\n");
00109         goto CLEANUP;
00110     }
00111 
00112     if(params->mstsp_min_cost == INT_MAX)
00113         params->mstsp_min_cost = info->max_cost;
00114     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->mstsp_min_cost, &max))
00115     {
00116         arrow_debug("Could not find mstsp_min_cost in cost_list\n");
00117         arrow_debug(" - Using max_cost = %d\n", info->max_cost);
00118         max = info->cost_list_length - 1;
00119     }
00120     
00121     low++;
00122     printf("low = %d; high = %d; max = %d\n", low, high, max);
00123     
00124     /* Main loop */
00125     arrow_debug("Starting balanced search [%d,%d]\n", info->cost_list[low], info->cost_list[high]);
00126     while((low <= high) && (low <= max) && (high < info->cost_list_length))
00127     {   
00128         /* Check to see if we're under the time bound */
00129         if(tour_result->total_time > params->timebound)
00130         {
00131             arrow_debug("Reached timebound of %.0fs.\n", params->timebound);
00132             break;
00133         }
00134         
00135         low_val = info->cost_list[low];
00136         high_val = info->cost_list[high];
00137         printf("%d <= C[i,j] <= %d: ", low_val, high_val);
00138                 
00139         tour_result->bin_search_steps++;
00140         
00141         /* First check if lower bounds are feasible */
00142         start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00143         if(!dt2_lb_feasible(problem, low_val, high_val, &is_feasible))
00144         {
00145             arrow_debug("Error checking lower bound feasibility\n");
00146             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00147             goto CLEANUP;
00148         }
00149         end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00150         *lb_time += end_time - start_time;
00151         
00152         /* If the lower bounds check out, then ask feasibility question */
00153         if(is_feasible)
00154         {            
00155             arrow_debug("LB is feasible, now trying to find a tour...\n");
00156             start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00157             if(!arrow_btsp_feasible(solve_problem, params->num_steps, params->steps,
00158                                     low_val, high_val, &is_feasible, &cur_tour_result))
00159             {
00160                 arrow_debug("Error checking tour feasibility\n");
00161                 ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00162                 goto CLEANUP;
00163             }
00164             end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00165             tour_result->total_time += end_time - start_time;
00166             
00167             for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00168             {
00169                 tour_result->solver_attempts[i] += cur_tour_result.solver_attempts[i];
00170                 tour_result->solver_time[i] += cur_tour_result.solver_time[i];
00171             }
00172         }
00173         
00174         if(is_feasible)
00175         {
00176             arrow_debug("Found a feasible tour!\n");
00177             arrow_debug("  - Tour MinCost = %d, MaxCost = %d\n", cur_tour_result.min_cost, cur_tour_result.max_cost);
00178             
00179             best_gap = best_tour_high - best_tour_low;
00180             cur_gap = cur_tour_result.max_cost - cur_tour_result.min_cost; 
00181             
00182             /* Find the indicates for the min and max cost in tour */
00183             if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, cur_tour_result.min_cost, &p))
00184             {
00185                 arrow_print_error("Could not find min_cost in cost_list\n");
00186                 ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00187                 goto CLEANUP;
00188             }
00189             if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, cur_tour_result.max_cost, &q))
00190             {
00191                 arrow_print_error("Could not find max_cost in cost_list\n");
00192                 ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00193                 goto CLEANUP;
00194             }
00195             
00196             if(cur_gap < best_gap)
00197             {
00198                 arrow_debug("Tour is better than the current best solution.\n");
00199                 
00200                 /* Copy over new best objective value and tour */
00201                 tour_result->min_cost = cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00202                 tour_result->max_cost = cur_tour_result.max_cost;
00203                 tour_result->tour_length = cur_tour_result.tour_length;
00204             
00205                 if(tour_result->tour != NULL)
00206                 {
00207                     tour_result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00208                     if(problem->symmetric)
00209                     {
00210                         for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00211                             tour_result->tour[i] = cur_tour_result.tour[i];
00212                     }
00213                     else
00214                     {
00215                         arrow_util_sbtsp_to_abstp_tour(solve_problem, cur_tour_result.tour, 
00216                                                        tour_result->tour);
00217                         tour_result->tour_length += problem->size * params->infinity;
00218                     }
00219                 }
00220         
00221                 best_tour_low = cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00222                 best_tour_high = cur_tour_result.max_cost;
00223                 
00224                 if(cur_gap == params->lower_bound)
00225                 {
00226                     arrow_debug("We found a gap equal to the lower bound!\n");
00227                     break;
00228                 }
00229             }
00230             
00231             /* Theorem 1 Improvement */
00232             if(params->with_improvements)
00233             {
00234                 if(best_tour_high - best_tour_low + params->mstsp_min_cost <= high_val)
00235                 {
00236                     arrow_debug("Tour is heuristically optimal.\n");
00237                     break;
00238                 }
00239             }
00240             
00241             low = p + 1;
00242             
00243             /* Theorem 2 Improvement */
00244             if(params->with_improvements)
00245             {
00246                 while(info->cost_list[high] - info->cost_list[low] > best_gap)
00247                     low++;
00248             }
00249             
00250             while(info->cost_list[high] - info->cost_list[low] < params->lower_bound)
00251                 high++;
00252         }
00253         else
00254         {
00255             high++;
00256             
00257             /* Theorem 2 Improvement */
00258             /*
00259             if(params->with_improvements)
00260             {
00261                 while(info->cost_list[high] - info->cost_list[low] >= best_gap)
00262                     low++;
00263             }
00264             */
00265         }
00266         
00267         arrow_debug("low = %d, high = %d\n", low, high);
00268     }
00269     
00270     arrow_debug("\n");
00271 
00272 CLEANUP:
00273     if(!problem->symmetric)
00274         arrow_problem_destruct(&asym_problem);
00275     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&cur_tour_result);
00276     return ret;
00277 }
00278 
00279 int 
00280 dt2_lb_feasible(arrow_problem *problem, int min_cost, int max_cost, 
00281                 int *is_feasible)
00282 {
00283     *is_feasible = ARROW_FALSE;
00284         
00285     if(!arrow_bbssp_biconnected(problem, min_cost, max_cost, is_feasible))
00286     {
00287         printf("Could not solve BBSSP for balanced LB.\n");
00288         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00289     }
00290     if(!*is_feasible)
00291     {
00292         printf("BBSSP is infeasible.\n");
00293         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00294     }
00295 
00296     if(!arrow_bap_has_assignment(problem, min_cost, max_cost, is_feasible))
00297     {
00298         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BAP for balanced LB\n");
00299         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00300     }
00301     if(!*is_feasible)
00302     {
00303         printf("BAP is infeasible.\n");
00304         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00305     }
00306 
00307     if(!problem->symmetric)
00308     {
00309         if(!arrow_bscssp_connected(problem, min_cost, max_cost, is_feasible))
00310         {
00311             arrow_print_error("Could not solve BSCSSP for balanced LB\n");
00312             return ARROW_FAILURE;
00313         }
00314         if(!*is_feasible)
00315         {
00316             printf("BSCSSP is infeasible.\n");
00317             return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00318         }
00319     }
00320     
00321     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00322 }
